description: Section 96a application for Non-Material Amendment to planning permission reference 38421/APP/2021/4045, dated 25-11-2022 (Redevelopment of the site to deliver data centre campus including: two data centre buildings (Use Class B8); associated energy and electricity infrastructure, buildings, and plant; security gatehouse, systems and enclosures; works to the highway, car parking and cycle parking; hard and soft landscaping; as well as associated infrastructure, ancillary office use, and associated external works) to amend Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) and including amendments to fuel store.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) attached to planning permission reference 38421/APP/2021/4045, dated 25-11-22, is amended to the following:

The development hereby permitted (comprising 37,547m2 floorspace within two data centre buildings (Use Class B8) measuring up to 38.42m in height, substation building, tank room and gatehouse and 65 no. car parking spaces), shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:

Notwithstanding the Non-Material Amendments hereby approved, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 38421/APP/2021/4045, dated 25-11-22, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans are SUPERSEDED by the Non-Material Amendments hereby approved:
The following plans are APPROVED by the Non-Material Amendment application:
